text: Luigi Farace (14 October 1934 â€“ 30 November 2018) was an Italian politician and businessman. He was a member the Christian Democrats of Italy. He was the Mayor of Bari from 1978 until 1981. He was then elected to Chamber of Deputies for two terms from 1987 to 1994. Farace died in Bari on 30 November 2018 at the age of 84. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Politicians from Apulia Category:Italian businesspeople Category:People from Bari
title: Luigi Farace
